seq.a: Every time we get a new order from the sales department
one of my masters determines the necessary parts and quantities as well as the delivery date
it has to be entered into our production planning system (PPS)

and.a: PPS optimizes our production processes and creates possibly uniform work packages
PPS creates a list of parts to be procured

seq.a: we need to decide whether any parts are missing and must be procured or if this is not necessary
we receive a notice from the system and an employee takes care of the implementation
the order will be checked again for its quality
